translation.en: [Storyteller] ♪ Come and gather 'round Listen to the story ♪
♪ Here in Xus Park Where the spirits play ♪
translation.fr: Au parc de Xus, des esprits se cachent

translation.en: ♪ Someone must protect Chumash territory ♪
translation.fr: Il faut protéger la terre des Chumash

translation.en: ♪ Who will hear The call to save the day? ♪
translation.fr: Qui sera là pour la sauver ?

translation.en: -♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Oh yeah! ♪
-♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Cho-ho! ♪
-♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Yeah ♪
♪ Hurricane or flood Sleeping sun or blizzard ♪
translation.fr:
Face au vent, aux crues
Au soleil ou au gel

translation.en: ♪ Kodi, Summer hawk, Eddy turtle too ♪
translation.fr:
Kodi, Summer le faucon
Et Eddy la tortue sont là

translation.en: -♪ With their friend Coyote ♪ -♪ And their best friend, Lizard ♪
translation.fr:
- Aidés de Coyote
- Et leur amie Lézarde

translation.en: ♪ Come and join the fun And we'll all say ♪ ♪ Haku! ♪
translation.fr:
- Venez vous amuser avec nous
- Haku !

translation.en: -♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Oh yeah! ♪
-♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Cho-ho! ♪
♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ The Spirit Rangers ♪
-♪ The Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
Whose idea was it to play stick game so early?
translation.fr:
Qui a eu l'idée
de jouer aux bâtons si tôt ?

translation.en: Oh, come on, Kodi. It's not that bad.
translation.fr: Allons, Kodi. Ce n'est pas si mal.

translation.en: Mom's bringing the white sticks, but I have the winner sticks.
translation.fr:
Maman a les bâtons blancs,
moi, j'ai les gagnants.

translation.en: Hmm, they have a stripe.
-[Lizard] Oh, praying mantis. -Huh?
Oh, you'll be the tastiest bug… in my bugsagna.
translation.fr:
Ce sera parfait…
dans mes lasagnes aux larves.

translation.en: Well, you found one winner stick. But where are the rest of them?
translation.fr: Tu as un bâton gagnant. Mais, les autres ?

translation.en: -[Mom] Who's ready to play stick game? -[gasps] Jump in, Lizard, before Mom sees.
translation.fr: Alors, prêts à jouer ? Vite, Lézarde, la voilà !

translation.en: [Lizard] Sweet dreams.
What a beautiful morning for stick game. You guys ready to play?
translation.fr:
Quelle belle matinée
pour jouer aux bâtons. Prêts ?

translation.en: It's a lot of fun, and the rules are easy.
Let's show them. There are two teams.
translation.fr: Montrons-leur. Il y a deux équipes.

translation.en: One team hides a stick in each hand.
translation.fr: On cache un bâton dans chaque main.

translation.en: The second team guesses which hand has the stick with the stripe.
translation.fr:
L'autre équipe devine
quelle main cache le bâton rayé.

translation.en: Take a guess, if you dare.
Oh man!
[chuckles] Gotcha.
That was just practice. Wait 'til we're in teams.
translation.fr: Je m'entrainais. Tu verras, en équipe !

translation.en: The more hands, the harder to guess.
We're in a huckleberry jam, everyone. I think we got the time wrong.
translation.fr:
On a un souci.
Ce n'est pas la bonne heure.

translation.en: -I don't see the sun rising anywhere. -Huh. Maybe Sunny's asleep. I mean--
translation.fr: Aucune trace du soleil. Soleil dort peut-être. Je…

translation.en: Weird. Our watches must be wrong. You kids sit tight.
We'll check our sunrise charts at the station.
Oh, you never know.
Maybe a trickster spirit changed our clocks. [laughs]
translation.fr: Sans doute l'œuvre d'un esprit farceur !

translation.en: I wonder why Sunny isn't up. He's the definition of a morning person.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi Soleil n'est-il pas levé ?
Lui qui est si matinal.

translation.en: Hmm, DeeDee said a trickster might have changed our clocks.
translation.fr: DeeDee a parlé d'un esprit farceur.

translation.en: Maybe Coyote knows what's going on.
Let's go to Spirit Park and find out.
translation.fr: Vérifions ça au Parc des Esprits.

translation.en: [woman] ♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Calling Kodi, Summer, Eddy ♪
translation.fr: Appel à Kodi, Summer et Eddy

translation.en: Kodi cub! [roars]
Summer hawk! [screeches]
♪ Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Spirit Rangers ♪
And Eddy turtle!
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
translation.fr:
Allez, les Spirit Rangers
Appel aux Spirit Rangers

translation.en: ♪ They're Spirit Ranger ready ♪
Sunny!
Qsi!
[Eddy] Where are you?
Hi, 'Away. Have you seen Sunny?
Nope, he's probably playing stick game with the star spirits.
translation.fr:
Non, il doit jouer aux bâtons
avec les esprits des étoiles.

translation.en: But now that he's gone, I can finally redecorate.
translation.fr: Mais sans lui, je peux enfin redécorer.

translation.en: It's beautiful.
Have you seen Coyote? He might be able to help us find Sunny.
translation.fr: Tu as vu Coyote ? Il pourrait nous aider.

translation.en: [groans] You're no fun. He's over there.
So, I heard you're looking for a missing Sunny.
translation.fr: Il paraît que vous cherchez Soleil ?

translation.en: Yes. Have you seen him?
Or are you hiding him and pranking us?
If you think I took Sunny, you're barking up the wrong coyote.
translation.fr:
Si vous pensez cela,
vous faites fausse route.

translation.en: I was too busy polishing this shiny seashell.
-Cool, huh? -[clatters]
-Uh, whoops. -Hey! Those are our winner sticks.
If you're hiding our sticks, what else are you hiding?
translation.fr: Si tu les caches, que caches-tu d'autre ?

translation.en: [Kodi] Come on, Coyote. Where is he?
I don't know!
I may have "borrowed" your sticks, but I'd never steal Sunny.
translation.fr:
J'ai "emprunté" vos bâtons,
mais je n'ai pas volé Soleil.

translation.en: -I promise. -Are you sure? No tricky stuff?
Listen, I don't pull those kinds of tricks,
translation.fr: Voyons, je ne ferais jamais ça,

translation.en: but I know some trickster spirits who do.
There are more trickster spirits?
Oh, yeah. Moon, little help?
translation.fr: Oui ! Lune, un coup de main ?

translation.en: [groans] Fine.
[Summer gasps] A moon shadow show?
-Cool! -Wow!
Once upon a cloud, there were four prank-loving pals.
translation.fr:
Jadis, sur un nuage,
vivaient quatre farceurs.

translation.en: First is Raven spirit from the Pacific Northwest.
translation.fr:
Parmi eux, Corbeau,
du nord-ouest du Pacifique.

translation.en: She's the brains behind most of their pranks.
translation.fr: C'est elle, le cerveau de la bande.

translation.en: This wouldn't be the first time she's tried to get her talons on Sunny.
translation.fr: Elle avait déjà tenté de piéger Soleil.

translation.en: Second is Rabbit spirit from the Southeast.
He's a loose cannon who loves two things, carrots and pranks.
translation.fr:
Imprévisible, fan de carottes
et de farces.

translation.en: And he's all out of carrots.
And third is Raccoon spirit from the Northeast.
She's the muscle of the team.
She's so strong,
I once saw her move Woodpecker's tree to the South Pole while he was sleeping.
translation.fr:
Elle a déplacé l'arbre
de Pic vert quand il dormait.

translation.en: He woke up frozen!
-Oh, no! -[both gasp]
I'm turtle trembling.
[Coyote] They call themselves the Trickster Trio.
translation.fr: Ils se font appeler le Trio de farceurs.

translation.en: They'll prank any spirit, human, or even Sunny himself!
translation.fr:
Capables de piéger esprits,
humains et même Soleil !

translation.en: But why would they steal him?
Probably because he keeps beating them at stick game.
translation.fr:
Parce qu'il les bat
toujours aux bâtons.

translation.en: [chuckling] They hate to lose, and Sunny just loves to brag.
translation.fr:
Ils détestent perdre
et Soleil s'en vante.

translation.en: Hmm, didn't you say there were four prank-loving pals, Coyote?
translation.fr:
Tu n'as pas dit
qu'ils étaient quatre, Coyote ?

translation.en: Well, yeah. I kinda, sorta, maybe, definitely used to work with them.
translation.fr:
Oui. Ça m'est arrivé
de travailler avec eux.

translation.en: [gasps] How do we know you're not still pranking with them now?
translation.fr:
Comment savoir
que ce n'est plus le cas ?

translation.en: Hold your horse spirits.
When we were partners, we just did petty jokes.
But once they started with the high pranks and goofs-demeanors, it was too much.
translation.fr:
Mais ils ont dépassé les bornes,
et c'en était trop.

translation.en: Even for me! I had to get out.
[groans] I'll prove it to you.
I know where to find them. But be on your toes.
Their hideouts might be full of pranks. Come on.
translation.fr: Leur cachette est truffée de farces.

translation.en: Hey, you pranked me.
Oops, sorry. [chuckling] I told you there would be pranks.
translation.fr:
Oups, désolé.
Je t'avais dit qu'il y aurait des farces.

translation.en: [screams] Snakes!
[groans] Coyote!
I didn't know they'd have prank snakes. Honest.
translation.fr:
Je ne savais pas,
pour les serpents. Juré !

translation.en: This feels like a wild-coyote chase.
translation.fr: Coyote nous mène en bateau, je crois.

translation.en: We've looked everywhere for the Trickster Trio,
and we've only gotten pranked.
Okay, there were a lot of pranks, but I promise I didn't know about them.
translation.fr:
Oui, mais je vous assure,
je n'étais pas au courant.

translation.en: Even if they were kind of funny. [laughs] Let's keep looking.
Maybe we should look for Sunny on our own.
Yeah, I think Coyote is just gonna lead us to more pranks.
translation.fr: Je crois que Coyote se fiche de nous.

translation.en: Summer, can you try to spot Sunny with your hawk-eye vision?
translation.fr: Summer, utilise ta vue perçante, OK ?

translation.en: On it! I'll be back in a squawk.
[gasps] That light looks just like Sunny. Come on!
[sighs] At least you're still with me, right, flower?
translation.fr: Au moins, tu es là, hein, Fleur ?

translation.en: Prank flower.
You guys see this?
Oh, never mind.
It's Sunny.
We found him.
-Shh! Look. -Huh?
Coyote was right about one thing, the Trickster Trio is real.
translation.fr:
Coyote a dit vrai :
le Trio de farceurs existe.

translation.en: Huddle up, Rangers. It's game time, and I've got a plan.
translation.fr:
Par ici, les Rangers.
On doit agir, et j'ai un plan.

translation.en: I'll paint a big red X on the ground and put a fresh bugsagna on it. Spirits love bugsagna.
translation.fr:
Je vais peindre un X et poser
leurs lasagnes aux larves adorées.

translation.en: Then, Eddy, you build a cage out of sticks.
translation.fr: Eddy, fais une cage en bâtons.

translation.en: And, Kodi, you drop the cage to trap them.
translation.fr: Kodi, tu la lâches, on les piège.

translation.en: [roars softly] All right.
With the Trio trapped, we can save Sunny.
translation.fr: Une fois le Trio piégé, on sauvera Soleil.

translation.en: Hey, look! There's a plate of bugsagna we can use.
Wait, where did that come from? And has this red X always been here?
translation.fr: Comment ça ? Et il y a déjà un X ?

translation.en: -[Eddy screams] -[Kodi] Oh no!
You thought you could trap us with a bugsagna gag?
translation.fr: Nous piéger avec des lasagnes, sérieux ?

translation.en: We wrote the book on bugsagna gags.
Hey, they think we're pranking amateurs. [laughs]
translation.fr:
Ils nous prennent
pour des farceurs amateurs.

translation.en: We was one hop ahead of you this whole time.
-Who are you anyway? -We're the Spirit Rangers.
-Now, give Sunny back. -No deal. Sunny stays with us.
translation.fr:
- Libérez Soleil.
- Non, il reste avec nous.

translation.en: Yes. And remember, you can never out-trick the Trickster Trio!
translation.fr:
Oui. Et rappelez-vous,
on ne piège pas le Trio de farceurs.

translation.en: They're just too tricky.
[sighs] I don't think we'll get Sunny back. Unless we think like a trickster.
translation.fr:
On ne sauvera pas Soleil.
À moins de penser en farceurs.

translation.en: I know just who to ask. Come on!
translation.fr: Je sais à qui demander. Allez !

translation.en: -[in a flat voice] Ah! Prank snake. Oh no! -[footsteps approaching]
Oh, Spirit Rangers, you're back.
Coyote, you were right. It was the Trickster Trio all along.
translation.fr: Coyote, tu avais raison. C'était le Trio.

translation.en: They took Sunny and, uh-- Wait.
What are you doing with that prank snake?
translation.fr: Que fais-tu avec ce faux serpent ?

translation.en: Uh… Nothing. It's not what it looks like.
I'm not planning a prank right now.
Look, I might be a trickster spirit, but I'm also your friend. Trust me.
translation.fr:
Je suis peut-être un farceur,
mais je suis ton ami. Crois-moi.

translation.en: ♪ I may enjoy a little joke From time to time ♪
translation.fr:
Oui, de temps en temps
J'aime faire des blagues

translation.en: ♪ All right, so I'm a prankster In his pranking prime ♪
translation.fr:
Je suis un petit farceur
Le spécialiste des gags

translation.en: ♪ But when it comes to friendship I'm steady as an oak ♪
translation.fr:
Mais, avec mes amis
Je ne fais pas de vague

translation.en: ♪ I'm here for you And that's no joke ♪
translation.fr:
Toujours à vos côtés
C'est pas une blague

translation.en: ♪ I've pulled some wild shenanigans To great acclaim ♪
translation.fr:
J'ai joué des vilains tours
Et on m'a applaudi

translation.en: ♪ The trickiest of tricksters In the trickster hall of fame ♪
translation.fr:
Le plus grand des farceurs
Le roi des pitreries

translation.en: ♪ But friendship is a promise That I will not revoke ♪
translation.fr:
Mais l'amitié est un trésor
Un joyau, une bague

translation.en: ♪ I'm here for you And that's no joke ♪
translation.fr:
Toujours à vos côtés
C'est pas une blague

translation.en: ♪ There comes a time When even I get serious ♪
♪ A time when All the joking finally ends ♪
translation.fr: Les meilleures blagues ont une fin

translation.en: ♪ And when you need my help I'm always serious ♪
translation.fr:
Et si vous avez besoin d'aide
Je resterai sérieux

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we're seriously friends ♪
translation.fr: Parce que nous ne faisons qu'un

translation.en: ♪ I swear that you can trust me And I'm not blowing smoke ♪
translation.fr:
Ayez confiance en moi
Je ne parle pas dans le vague

translation.en: ♪ I'm here for you And that's no joke ♪
translation.fr:
Toujours à vos côtés
C'est pas une blague

translation.en: We're sorry we didn't believe you, Coyote.
I know I can be tricky, but not when our friends need help.
translation.fr:
Je ne blague jamais
avec des amis en détresse.

translation.en: [screams] Prank snake!
Wait a sec. Pranks got us into this mess, maybe pranks can get us out of it too.
translation.fr:
Minute. Les farces nous ont menés ici,
alors servons-nous-en.

translation.en: Now you're thinking like a trickster. And I know just how to out-prank them.
translation.fr:
Ça, c'est penser en farceur.
Et je sais comment les piéger.

translation.en: Hey, squirt.
Move along!
We're not giving Sunny back, capisce?
Actually, we don't need you to give us Sunny back.
translation.fr: En fait, pas besoin de nous le rendre.

translation.en: We already have him.
That's a good one. Nice try. Nothing gets past my bird brain.
translation.fr:
Pas mal, bien tenté !
Je suis pas née de la dernière branche.

translation.en: See for yourself.
What?
How?
Impossible!
So pretty.
Which one of you let Sunny go?
Hey, I couldn't have done it. I was too busy thinking about carrots.
translation.fr:
Pas moi, j'avais la tête
perdue dans mes carottes.

translation.en: Baby carrots, and purple carrots, and--
Stop!
-[Crow] No! -[Rabbit] Don't let Sunny get away!
-It keeps slipping out of my talons! -[Rabbit] Out of my way!
translation.fr:
- Il m'échappe !
- Hors de mon chemin !

translation.en: [gasps] Quick! While they aren't looking!
Oh my stars. Thank you, Spirit Rangers.
Hey, tricksters. Did you miss me?
translation.fr: Hé, les farceurs. Je vous ai manqué ?

translation.en: -Coyote? -What are you doing here?
Oh, just doing what I do best. Pranks.
translation.fr: Oh, ce en quoi j'excelle. Des farces.

translation.en: That's not Sunny!
-No! -[Crow] You foiled us this time,
translation.fr:
- C'est pas Soleil !
- Non ! Vous avez gagné,

translation.en: but this isn't the last you've seen of the Trickster Trio!
translation.fr:
mais le Trio de farceurs
n'a pas dit son dernier couac.

translation.en: Thanks, Coyote. We couldn't have saved Sunny without you.
translation.fr:
Merci, Coyote. - Sans toi, Soleil était cuit.
- C'est ça, l'amitié.

translation.en: That's what friends are for. And for playing pranks and games with.
translation.fr:
- Sans toi, Soleil était cuit.
- C'est ça, l'amitié. - Faire des farces et jouer.
- Justement…

translation.en: Speaking of games, we can finally play stick game!
translation.fr:
- Faire des farces et jouer.
- Justement… jouons aux bâtons !

translation.en: Well, you're gonna need these winner sticks.
translation.fr: Il vous faudra… ces bâtons gagnants.

translation.en: [Dad] Eddy's first. Guess.
Which hand do you think has the striped stick, hon?
translation.fr: Quelle main cache le bâton rayé ?

translation.en: Come on, Eddy.
-Kids win! -I did it!
I thought the stick was in my other hand. Weird. Maybe it was the tricksters again.
translation.fr:
Je pensais l'avoir dans l'autre main.
Encore un tour des farceurs, hein.

translation.en: -You might be right. -[giggles nervously]
Mama Bear reporting. Baby Bear, do you and Hover Hawk see the target?
translation.fr: Ici maman ourse. Vous voyez la cible ?

translation.en: On it, Mama Bear.
But we can't get close enough.
[Mom] Air Dad 1, do you have eyes on her?
[Dad] Aw! It's a kitty!
I'll call you P-a-sh Pay-sh. That's the Cowlitz word for "kitten."
translation.fr:
Je t'appellerai Pash Paysh.
"Chaton", en cowlitz.

translation.en: -I've got you, P-a-sh Pay-sh. -[Summer] Here, kitty.
translation.fr: Je te tiens, Pash Paysh. Viens, chaton.

translation.en: -[meowing] -[Mom] Oh, goodness!
Got you, little kitty.
Good catch, Eddy.
-[giggles] -Is P-a-sh Pay-sh okay?
I think so.
Hmm. I'm not seeing a collar. She might be a stray.
A stray?
There's no way a kitten this cute doesn't have a home.
translation.fr:
On peut pas la laisser
errer dans la nature.

translation.en: If P-a-sh Pay-sh doesn't have a home, what if we adopt her?
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, on peut l'adopter ?

translation.en: Aw, Eddy. Adopting a cat is a big responsibility.
translation.fr:
Eddy. Adopter un chat
est une grande responsabilité.

translation.en: [sighs] Dad's right. Kittens need a lot of time and attention to be safe and happy.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai.
Elle a besoin de temps et d'affection.

translation.en: I can do it. Did you see how awesome I was when I rescued her?
translation.fr:
Je peux le faire.
Je l'ai bien sauvée, non ?

translation.en: That was great, Eddy, but we still think -you should wait before adopting. -Aw.
translation.fr:
Oui, mais tu n'es pas encore prêt
à adopter un chat.

translation.en: [Mom] My friends at the cat rescue will find her a home.
translation.fr: Le refuge lui trouvera un foyer.

translation.en: Now let's get you cleaned up. You're one adventurous kitty.
translation.fr:
Allons te nettoyer un peu,
ma petite aventurière.

translation.en: But we can keep her here. [sighs] I want a cat more than anything.
translation.fr:
On peut la garder ici.
J'ai trop envie d'avoir un chat.

translation.en: [softly] Excuse me. Do you mind lowering your voices?
translation.fr:
Excusez-moi. Parlez moins fort.
Mes petits félins dorment.

translation.en: I don't want to wake my kittens.
translation.fr:
Parlez moins fort.
Mes petits félins dorment.

translation.en: I spent the past hour purring them to sleep.
translation.fr: J'ai passé une heure à les endormir.

translation.en: [gasps] Did you say "kittens"?
-[both] Shh! -They're asleep.
-[whispers] Did you say "kittens"? -Sure did.
I'm Tuk'e'm, the Chumash mountain lion spirit.
translation.fr:
Je suis Tuk'e'm,
l'esprit du lion des montagnes.

translation.en: These are my spirit kittens, -Meow Meow, Mittens, and Lalanxa. -[snoring]
translation.fr:
Voici mes lionceaux spirituels,
Miaou Miaou, Mitaines et Lalanxa.

translation.en: I love kittens.
So cute.
They're just like P-a-sh Pay-sh! I wish we could play with them.
translation.fr:
Comme Pash Paysh.
Je veux jouer avec eux.

translation.en: Well, you can!
I've heard Spirit Rangers take care of every crook, cranny, and critter.
translation.fr:
Les Spirit Rangers
veillent sur toutes les créatures.

translation.en: Want to kitten-sit for me?
-Uh… -I don't think we're ready to--
translation.fr:
- Nous ne sommes pas prêts…
- Oui.

translation.en: We'll do it. I know Mom and Dad said we're not ready.
translation.fr:
- Nous ne sommes pas prêts…
- Oui. Maman et papa ont leur avis.

translation.en: -But I think we're responsible enough. -Well, they are super cute.
translation.fr:
- Mais nous sommes assez responsables.
- Ils sont trop chou.

translation.en: Thanks.
Yeah. Maybe it won't be that hard.
translation.fr: Oui. Ce ne sera pas si compliqué.

translation.en: Creator knows I could use a nap.
Have fun with the Spirit Rangers, my babies.
translation.fr: Amusez-vous bien avec les Spirit Rangers.

translation.en: -Meow, meow. -Haku!
Play, Spirit Rangers.
This cannot be good.
We got this. Let's go to Spirit Park, where we could have some real fun.
translation.fr:
On gère. Vite,
au Parc des esprits, on va s'amuser !

translation.en: [woman] ♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Calling Kodi, Summer, Eddy ♪
translation.fr: Appel à Kodi, Summer et Eddy

translation.en: Kodi cub! [roars]
Summer hawk! [screeches]
♪ Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Spirit Rangers ♪
And Eddy turtle!
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ They're Spirit Ranger ready ♪
-Kittens, are you ready to play? -[meowing]
Play!
[groans] Are you kitten me?
Ah, so, you're watching the spirit kittens. They can be a pawful. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Vous surveillez les lionceaux ?
Pas facile !

translation.en: Tell me about it. They won't stop chasing my sunbeams.
translation.fr:
Oui, ils ne cessent
de jouer avec mes rayons.

translation.en: No. No. No!
Spirit Park might not be able to handle cute kittens, but I can.
translation.fr:
C'est dur pour le Parc des esprits,
mais pas pour moi.

translation.en: ♪ You know who's simply purr-fect And paw-sitively great? ♪
translation.fr:
Qui sont les meilleurs
Les plus adorables ?

translation.en: ♪ All these little kitties I could play with every day ♪
translation.fr:
Ce sont mes bébés félins
Mes compagnons de jeu

translation.en: ♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ No, I ain't kitten' I am smitten ♪
translation.fr:
Je ne mens pas
J'en suis baba

translation.en: ♪ There's a paw-sibility You're all my best fur-ends ♪
translation.fr:
J'en suis certain
On est félins pour l'autre

translation.en: ♪ There will be no cat-tastrophes On Eddy you can depend ♪
translation.fr:
Pas de chat-tastrophe
Eddy est des vôtres

translation.en: ♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ No, I ain't kitten' I am smitten ♪
translation.fr:
Je ne mens pas
J'en suis baba

translation.en: See? This is easy.
translation.fr:
Voilà, facile.
Pas besoin d'en faire une montagne.

translation.en: -We've got this covered like fur on a cat. -[Coyote] Are you sure?
translation.fr:
Voilà, facile.
Pas besoin d'en faire une montagne. Sûr ?

translation.en: It looks like Mittens is about to jump into a dangerous volcano.
translation.fr:
Mitaines s'apprête à sauter
dans un volcan.

translation.en: -No! -Mittens!
-Stop! -[screams]
Gotcha.
-Little stink bug. -[Mittens giggles]
-Good save. -[meowing]
That was close.
Hey, uh, real quick.
Did anyone else feel a kitten try to jump inside their head or was that just me?
translation.fr:
C'est moi ou j'avais un lionceau
dans le carafon ?

translation.en: -Nope. -Eh, not any more than usual.
Sorry, Lawetlat'la. We'll play somewhere a little less lava-y.
translation.fr:
Désolée, Lawetlat'la.
Ils se sont un peu enflammés.

translation.en: Yeah. We need to tire them out before they pounce again.
translation.fr:
Oui. Épuisons-les
pour qu'ils ne sautent plus.

translation.en: -Too late. -Whee!
Looks like it's time for a turtle tumble!
translation.fr: C'est une mission pour une tortue.

translation.en: -Seriously?! Come on! -Yeah!
Dad was right.
Taking care of animals is harder than it looks.
No, it isn't. We got this. And just look at them.
All of this playing has finally tuckered them out.
-[yawning] -I want bugsagna.
translation.fr: Je veux des lasagnes aux larves.

translation.en: You and me both, little guy.
After all of this running and playing, I need to hibernate.
translation.fr:
Après tous ces efforts,
j'ai besoin d'hiberner.

translation.en: [yawns] I'll just rest my hawk eyes for a second.
See? Kitten-sitting is… [yawns] …easy.
-[Spirit Rangers snoring] -Hey, uh, Spirit Rangers, you might want to wake up.
translation.fr: Hé, les Spirit Rangers, on se réveille.

translation.en: -What? -Why?
Five more minutes.
Let's just say the kittens woke up, ran off,
translation.fr: Euh, les félins se sont réveillés

translation.en: and are causing chaos all over the park! Which is usually my job.
translation.fr:
et sèment la zizanie.
Normalement, c'est moi.

translation.en: -[suspenseful music plays] -Oh no. We need to find them quick.
-Huh? -[caws] This is not a scratching post!
Summer hawk to the rescue!
-Sorry, Condor. We'll fix your home later. -[giggles]
Don't you dare! That's my best friend's forever mug.
translation.fr: Stop ! C'est mon mug du meilleur ami.

translation.en: [giggles] Cup!
There. Your cup is safe and sound. -And Lalanxa is coming with me. -[yelps]
translation.fr:
Voilà. Ton mug est protégé.
Et Lalanxa vient avec moi.

translation.en: -[giggles, purrs] -Come here, kitty.
Oh, no, you don't.
It felt like a kitten tried to jump into my head again.
translation.fr: J'ai encore cru voir un lionceau.

translation.en: Weird. Maybe I need to clear out my sinuses.
translation.fr:
Bizarre. Ça doit venir
de mes sinus.

translation.en: For being so cute, these kittens sure are troublemakers.
translation.fr:
Ils sont adorables,
mais quelles canailles !

translation.en: No wonder Tuk'e'm needed a cat nap. I could use another hibernation.
translation.fr:
Tuk'e'm mérite bien sa sieste.
Et moi, une hibernation.

translation.en: -But I love them so much. -Play!
We've just gotta keep them safe and in one place.
translation.fr: Il leur faut juste un lieu sûr.

translation.en: I have the perfect idea of how to keep them together.
translation.fr: Et je connais l'endroit parfait pour ça.

translation.en: -Welcome to your new kitten playpen. -[kittens laughing] Wow!
translation.fr: Bienvenue dans le parc à félins.

translation.en: -[meowing, purring] -[Summer] Purr-fect idea, Eddy!
translation.fr:
Génial, Eddy ! Ils ont des jouets,
une tour, à manger et de l'eau.

translation.en: They have toys, a cat tower, -food and water. -[purrs]
translation.fr:
Ils ont des jouets,
une tour, à manger et de l'eau.

translation.en: And there's nothing they could destroy. This might actually work.
translation.fr:
Et ils ne peuvent rien détruire.
Ça devrait faire l'affaire.

translation.en: See? I can take care of kittens.
Now, do you kitties promise to stay put and not get into any trouble?
translation.fr:
Bien, vous me promettez
de ne plus causer d'ennuis ?

translation.en: Yep, definitely gone.
Again? Where could they be?
-I th-- thought I had it under control. -[gasps]
translation.fr: Je croyais avoir tout sous contrôle.

translation.en: Oh no! They're at the edge of the waterfall.
-Hurry! -[Eddy] Oh no!
We can't let them fall.
This is a cat-tastrophe. We need to save them.
translation.fr:
Quelle chat-tastrophe.
Il faut les sauver.

translation.en: Wait! Remember when we tried to grab P-a-sh Pay-sh at the Ranger tower
translation.fr:
Minute ! Souvenez-vous,
quand on a attrapé Pash Paysh

translation.en: and she got scared and fell? We need a distraction.
translation.fr: et qu'elle est tombée. Faisons diversion.

translation.en: Hmm. What if we try distracting the kittens with things they like?
translation.fr:
Si on essayait
avec un truc qu'ils aiment ?

translation.en: That's it. Once we distract them,
I can sneak up and catch them with my turtle bubbles. Come on.
translation.fr:
et je les attrape
dans mes bulles. Allons-y.

translation.en: Here, kitty, kitty, kitty.
-Over here! -Pretty kitty!
Look at the feathers.
Tickle, tickle!
[Coyote] Wanna play?
I know you want the toy. Yes, you do.
translation.fr: Vous voulez attraper ce jouet, hein.

translation.en: -Oh, no! -Fun!
[Kodi] Kittens!
-No! Eddy! -[all gasp]
-[Summer] Hurry! -[kittens yelling]
There. Now you're safe and sound.
Ah, well, it's good to know the spirit kittens are okay.
translation.fr: C'est bon de les savoir sains et saufs.

translation.en: -Watch the tail! -[Tuk'e'm yawns]
So, what did I hiss?
I mean, miss.
Sorry, us cats hiss a lot.
-Mama! -[giggling]
Wow, my kittens are safe, and they seem really happy.
translation.fr:
Oh, mes bébés sont en sécurité,
et ils s'amusent bien !

translation.en: You can kitten-sit my babies anytime you'd like.
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez les garder
quand vous le souhaitez.

translation.en: Tuk'e'm, we had fun kitten-sitting for you today,
translation.fr: Tuk'e'm, on s'est bien amusés avec eux,

translation.en: but it was a lot harder than we thought it'd be.
translation.fr: mais c'était plus difficile que prévu.

translation.en: And I'm not sure if my hawk heart can take another kitten rescue.
translation.fr: Mon cœur de faucon bat la chamade.

translation.en: Yeah. If today has taught me anything,
it's that I'll have a cat of my own someday,
but I'm not ready now.
Even if I love them so, so, so, so, so much.
Well, you can visit my spirit kittens any time.
translation.fr:
Eh bien, passe leur rendre visite
quand tu le désires.

translation.en: Right, babies?
-[kittens mewing] -Yes!
Aw, cute.
But next time, leave the chaos to me.
There. Now you're ready for your new family.
Hi, P-a-sh Pay-sh.
We made you something special to remember us by. Ta-da!
translation.fr: On t'a préparé un petit souvenir. Ta-da !

translation.en: Now you're an honorary Junior Ranger. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Bienvenue chez les rangers en herbe.

translation.en: Okay, kids. Our friend at the cat rescue is here,
translation.fr: Bien, mon amie du refuge est ici,

translation.en: and she's ready to take P-a-sh Pay-sh to her new home.
translation.fr: pour lui présenter sa nouvelle maison.

translation.en: Honey, seeing P-a-sh Pay-sh leave might be too much for the kids.
translation.fr: Ce sera dur pour eux de la voir partir.

translation.en: No, it's okay. I know I'm not ready to adopt a cat yet.
translation.fr:
Non, ça va.
Je sais que je ne suis pas encore prêt.

translation.en: I'm sad
but also happy P-a-sh Pay-sh is going somewhere that can take care of her.
translation.fr:
mais tant mieux pour Pash Paysh,
elle sera heureuse.

translation.en: That's really wise, little guy.
I know that this sort of thing can be hard,
but I just want you to know that we found your kitten a nice home
translation.fr: mais sache qu'elle s'y sentira bien,

translation.en: with a good family that has everything a kitten could need.
translation.fr:
entourée d'une famille
qui fera tout pour elle.

translation.en: Purrfect.
Hi, baby. Want to say goodbye to your friends before you go?
translation.fr: Trésor, tu dis au revoir à tes amis ?

translation.en: -[giggles] It tickles. -Aw, so cute.
-[Kodi] Bye! -Have fun in your new home!
I'm so glad I got to meet you, P-a-sh Pay-sh.
translation.fr: Ravi de t'avoir rencontrée, Pash Paysh.
